label: appliedChemicalTreatment
comment: A chemical treatment applied during this production process.
A chemical treatment applied to this product batch.
A chemical treatment applied to this trade product.
A specified chemical treatment applied to this agricultural application.

rangeIncludes.comment: Any substance such as dyestuffs, chrome oxide, acids, sulphate, surfactant or other chemicals applied to an agricultural field, substrate, plant, animal product, material or product.

domainIncludes.comment: Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.
A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
